titles.title: A bill to authorize extension of the time limitation for a FERC-issued hydroelectric license.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power.

bill.summary: 7/1/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon request of a certain licensee, to extend the time required to commence construction of a specified hydroelectric project.
